Package org.harctoolbox.harchardware.beacon

Class AmxBeaconListener

java.lang.Object
org.harctoolbox.harchardware.beacon.AmxBeaconListener
public class AmxBeaconListener extends Object
This class listens for an AMX beacon and reports its findings.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    AmxBeaconListener.Callback
    This is called when a new node appears, or a node is removed.
    static class 
    AmxBeaconListener.Node
    This class contains one node discovered by its AMX beacon.
